price: Waɗanda suka kãfirta kuma suka kange daga hanyar, Allah, Mun ƙãra musu wata azãba bisa ga azãbar, sabõda abin da suka kasance sunã yi na fasãdi.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ زِدۡنَٰهُمۡ عَذَابٗا فَوۡقَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يُفۡسِدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi zid'nāhum ʿadhāban fawqa al-ʿadhābi bimā kānū yuf'sidūna
